com.sabre.sws.des.soap

Class SoapApplicationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sabre.sws.des.soap.SoapApplicationConfiguration

  • @Configuration
@ComponentScan
@Import(value={com.sabre.sws.des.configuration.ConfigurationConfig.class,com.sabre.sws.des.errors.ErrorHandlerConfiguration.class})
@EnableAsync
@EnableScheduling
public class SoapApplicationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Main configuration class. Adds callbacks to the Spring context, as well as the marshaller used to marshal/unmarshal security header.
